sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 ( COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, CASE_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, TITLE, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY, SUBJECT_ID, IS_AUTO_SAVED, COM_TYPE, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS )values ( #id#, #crn#,#processCycleId#,#tableBottomNotes#, #title#, sysdate,#updateBy#, #subjectId#, #isAutoSave#, #compType#, #status#, #descriptionOfStatus# )

SELECT RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 ( COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, CASE_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID, SUBJECT_ID, TITLE, UPDATED_ON, UPDATED_BY, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, IS_AUTO_SAVED, PARENT_RECORD_ID, COM_TYPE, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS )values ( #autoSaveId#, #crn#, #processCycleId#, #subjectId#, #title#, sysdate, #updateBy#, #tableBottomNotes#, 'Y', #id#, #compType#, #status#, #descriptionOfStatus# )

SELECT RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_HST ( HISTORY_ID, COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, SUBJECT_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY, TITLE, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS ) values( #historyId#,#id#,#subjectId#,#processCycleId#,#crn#,sysdate,#updateBy#,#title#,#tableBottomNotes#,#status#, #descriptionOfStatus# )

insert into RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_HST (HISTORY_ID,COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID,COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID,SUMMARY_HISTORY_ID,ROW_NO,FIELD_NAME,FIELD_VALUE,COMMENTS) (select RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_HST_SEQ.nextval, COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID,#pdId#,#historyId#,ROW_NO, FIELD_NAME,FIELD_VALUE,COMMENTS from RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 where COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID =#pdId#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, rg.CASE_ID, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, cc.DESCRIPTION, rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME SUBJECT_NAME, rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, rg.TITLE, rg.UPDATED_ON,rg.UPDATED_BY, rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED, rg.COM_TYPE, rg.STATUS, rg.DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS, pd.ROW_NO, pd.FIELD_NAME,pd.FIELD_VALUE, pd.COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID,pd.COMMENTS, pd.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID
FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 pd ON pd.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID = rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID JOIN CMS_CASECYCLE cc ON cc.CASECYCLE_ID = rg.PROCESSCYCLEID JOIN RG_SUBJECT cs ON cs.SUBJECT_ID = rg.SUBJECT_ID WHERE rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID =#id# ORDER BY pd.ROW_NO ASC
sqlMap.update: update RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 set TITLE = #title#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES = #tableBottomNotes#, PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# , UPDATED_ON=sysdate, UPDATED_BY=#updateBy#, IS_AUTO_SAVED = 'N', PARENT_RECORD_ID = null, STATUS=#status# , DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS=#descriptionOfStatus# where COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID = #id#

update RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 set TITLE=#title#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES=#tableBottomNotes#, PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#, UPDATED_ON=sysdate, UPDATED_BY=#updateBy#, IS_AUTO_SAVED = 'Y', PARENT_RECORD_ID = #id#, STATUS=#status# , DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS=#descriptionOfStatus# where COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID = #autoSaveId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, rg.CASE_ID, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, cc.DESCRIPTION, rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME, to_char(rg.UPDATED_ON, 'DD-Mon-YY HH24:MI:SS') as displayDate, NVL(rg.UPDATED_BY,'System') UPDATED_BY, COM_TYPE FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg ,CMS_CASECYCLE cc, RG_SUBJECT cs, rg_report_subcomponents sbcmp WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# and rg.PROCESSCYCLEID = cc.CASECYCLE_ID and rg.SUBJECT_ID = cs.SUBJECT_ID AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') AND rg.com_type = sbcmp.subcomponent_name
rg.SUBJECT_ID=#subjectId#
rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId#
order by cs.is_primary_sub desc,cs.REPORT_ORDER asc,upper(cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME) asc,cc.processcycle_order desc ,sbcmp.subcomponent_order ) a
WHERE ROWNUM <= #limit#
)
WHERE rn >= #start#

SELECT count(*) from ( select distinct rg.subject_id, rg.processcycleid, rg.case_id, sub.report_order,cc.processcycle_order,rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg join RG_SUBJECT sub on sub.subject_id = rg.subject_id join cms_casecycle cc on cc.casecycle_id = rg.processcycleid group by rg.subject_id, rg.processcycleid, rg.case_id, sub.REPORT_ORDER, cc.processcycle_order,rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED having rg.case_id = #crn# and upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') ) cdata
select count(*) from ( select case_id from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 where case_id=#crn# union select case_id from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_HST where case_id=#crn# )
SELECT rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg WHERE upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND rg.PARENT_RECORD_ID = #parentId#
SELECT rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID IS NULL and COM_TYPE =#componentType#
select count(rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID) FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg WHERE rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete: delete FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID IS NULL
delete FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 WHERE CASE_ID=#crn# AND upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('Y') AND PARENT_RECORD_ID = #parentId#

delete FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 WHERE COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID in
#ids[]#
sqlMap.update: update RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 set ROW_NO=#rowNo#, FIELD_NAME =#fieldName#, FIELD_VALUE =#fieldValue# where COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID = #id#
sqlMap.delete:
delete FROM RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 WHERE COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID IN
#ids[]#
sqlMap.select: select rem.subject_id subject_id, rem.processcycleid Process_Cycle_Id,cs.subject_name subject_name, ccl.DESCRIPTION Process_Cycle from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rem, RG_SUBJECT cs ,CMS_CASECYCLE ccl where cs.CRN = rem.case_id and ccl.CASECYCLE_ID= rem.processcycleid and cs.subject_id =rem.subject_id and rem.case_id = #crn# and rem.COM_TYPE = #compType# and upper(rem.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') order by cs.subject_id, rem.processcycleid

select rem.processcycleid Process_Cycle_Id,cc.DESCRIPTION Process_Cycle from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rem, cms_casecycle cc where rem.subject_id=#subId# and rem.case_id=#crn# and cc.casecycle_id= rem.processcycleid and upper(rem.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') and rem.COM_TYPE = #compType# and rem.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID != #recordId#

select count(*) from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 where PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# and SUBJECT_ID = #subjectId# and case_id=#crn# and upper(COM_TYPE)=upper(#compType#) and upper(IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N')
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 ( COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, CASE_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, TITLE, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY, SUBJECT_ID, IS_AUTO_SAVED, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS, COM_TYPE ) select #id#, CASE_ID, #processCycleId#, TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, TITLE, sysdate,#userName#, SUBJECT_ID, IS_AUTO_SAVED, STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS, COM_TYPE from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 where COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID =#recordId#

insert into RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 (COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID,COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID,ROW_NO,FIELD_NAME,FIELD_VALUE,COMMENTS) SELECT RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#genSumryId#, ROW_NO, FIELD_NAME, FIELD_VALUE,COMMENTS from RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 Where COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID=#recordId#

SELECT RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_HST (HISTORY_ID,COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TITLE,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,STATUS)
select #id#,#genSumryId#, SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID, sysdate,#userName#,TITLE,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,STATUS from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 where COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID=#genSumryId#

insert into RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_HST (HISTORY_ID,COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID,COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID,SUMMARY_HISTORY_ID,ROW_NO,FIELD_NAME,COMMENTS,FIELD_VALUE) select RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_HST_SEQ.nextval,COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID,COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID,#genHistoryId#,ROW_NO,FIELD_NAME,COMMENTS,FIELD_VALUE from RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 where COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID=#genSumryId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ROW_NO,FIELD_NAME,COMMENTS FROM RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_STATIC_IS3 where sub_component_type=#compType# ORDER BY ROW_NO
SELECT count(*) FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_HST rg where rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID=#recordId#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM (SELECT rg.HISTORY_ID, rg.UPDATED_ON, rg.UPDATED_BY, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID , cc.DESCRIPTION, rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,rg.STATUS
FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_HST rg,CMS_CASECYCLE cc
WHERE rg.PROCESSCYCLEID = cc.CASECYCLE_ID and rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID=#recordId# order by rg.UPDATED_ON desc ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #limit#) WHERE rn >= #start#

select pd.COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID, pd.ROW_NO, pd.FIELD_NAME,pd.FIELD_VALUE, pd.COMMENTS, pd.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID
from RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_HST pd where pd.SUMMARY_HISTORY_ID=#recordId# ORDER BY ROW_NO ASC
sqlMap.insert:
insert into RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_HST(HISTORY_ID,COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID,SUBJECT_ID,PROCESSCYCLEID,CASE_ID, UPDATED_ON,UPDATED_BY,TITLE,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS) SELECT RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_HST_SEQ.nextval,inner_view.* FROM
(SELECT #recList[]# COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID ,SUBJECT_ID, PROCESSCYCLEID , CASE_ID ,sysdate,#userName# UPDATED_BY ,TITLE ,TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES,STATUS, DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS from RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 where COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID=#recList[]#)
inner_view
sqlMap.select:
SELECT rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, rg.CASE_ID, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, cc.DESCRIPTION, rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME, to_char(rg.UPDATED_ON, 'DD-Mon-YY HH24:MI:SS') as displayDate, NVL(rg.UPDATED_BY,'System') UPDATED_BY, COM_TYPE FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg ,CMS_CASECYCLE cc, RG_SUBJECT cs, rg_report_subcomponents sbcmp WHERE rg.PROCESSCYCLEID = cc.CASECYCLE_ID and rg.SUBJECT_ID = cs.SUBJECT_ID
( rg.SUBJECT_ID = #subProcList[].subjectId# and rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#subProcList[].processCycleId# and rg.CASE_ID =#subProcList[].crn# )
AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') and rg.com_type = sbcmp.subcomponent_name order by cs.is_primary_sub desc,cs.REPORT_ORDER asc,upper(cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME) asc,cc.processcycle_order desc,sbcmp.subcomponent_order
SELECT rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, rg.UPDATED_ON FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg WHERE rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID = #id#

SELECT rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID, rg.CASE_ID, rg.PROCESSCYCLEID, cc.DESCRIPTION, rg.SUBJECT_ID, cs.REPORT_SUBJECT_NAME SUBJECT_NAME, rg.TABLE_BOTTOM_NOTES, rg.TITLE, rg.UPDATED_ON,rg.UPDATED_BY, rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED, rg.COM_TYPE, rg.STATUS, rg.DESCRIPTION_OF_STATUS, pd.ROW_NO, pd.FIELD_NAME,pd.FIELD_VALUE, pd.COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID,pd.COMMENTS, pd.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID
FROM RG_COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3 rg LEFT OUTER JOIN RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 pd ON pd.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID = rg.COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID JOIN CMS_CASECYCLE cc ON cc.CASECYCLE_ID = rg.PROCESSCYCLEID JOIN RG_SUBJECT cs ON cs.SUBJECT_ID = rg.SUBJECT_ID WHERE rg.SUBJECT_ID =#subjectId# and rg.PROCESSCYCLEID=#processCycleId# and rg.CASE_ID=#crn# and rg.COM_TYPE =#otherCompanyBGInfoForm# AND upper(rg.IS_AUTO_SAVED)=upper('N') ORDER BY pd.ROW_NO ASC
sqlMap.insert: insert into RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3 (COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_ID,COM_BG_SUMMARY_IS3_ID,ROW_NO,FIELD_NAME,COMMENTS) SELECT RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_IS3_SEQ.nextval,#id#,ROW_NO,FIELD_NAME,COMMENTS FROM RG_COM_BG_DETAILS_STATIC_IS3 where SUB_COMPONENT_TYPE=#compType#
